name: AudioAutoQ
short_description: AudioAutoQ is an framework and collection of open source tools for developing audio questionnaires for mobile devices. It allows asking questions in the local language of the respondent and does not require that the person know how to read and write. It uses audio instructions in local language and visual clues to make it easy to understand and answer the questions. For example, numbers will be read in audio and will also be represented in the bills and coins that people use everyday. It is expected that even those who did not go to school know how to count local currency bills and coins as they are supposed to conduct transactions on a regular basis. Another simplification choice is that it takes only five buttons to answer all the questions, even those asking for numeric values. There is therefore no need for the respondent to understand letters and numbers. AudioAutoQ tools uses html5/css/javascript in order to allow deploying questionnaires on a large variety of mobile platforms.
summary: Tools for creating and deploying audio questionnaires on mobile phones
